data.message:
"I'm not gonna listen to Eminem anymore cause he went political."

Would you say this if he was pro-Trump? No. You only say it cause he doesn't align with your political beliefs.

All I'm seeing is Eminem cleaning out his swamp full of close minded fans. Bye Felicia!

replies.message: Isn't this more divide??? Eminem doesn't even want the support of his fans who like trump that is insane

Frank Keller The divide is done, he says if you still support trump than there is nothing left to discuss, you are choosing a POTUS that is nothing more than a racist moron. who can't wait to start a war.
Frank Keller Eminem don’t give a fuck about your bitch asses 😂😂😂
Bye amigooo! 😆

Julie Wilson The divide was done a year before 2017 even started. Obama was the divider in chief. He failed us in every direction. Do you know why? Because he never was for US, he is for Islam. Soros is the leader of leftists with Obamas help trying to destroy our country as we know it. You unknowingly follow your own destruction.
bye brandon dont let the door hit your ass on the way out

hahahahaha

"I'm not gonna listen to Eminem anymore cause he went against my president"? I never listened to begin with because he goes against basis human morals. And now all of a sudden he's the spokesman for the loonie left all because he went against Trump. Before Trump, liberal bitches all cried when he was gay bashing but now he's so great. God you people are so pathetic.

Lol people think I'm against Em? I'm the biggest Eminem fanboy I know.
"Because he went political"? Anyone as of this day who hasn't "gone political" has a dead mind and soul.
Let's face it. Eminem is wayy past his prime and he is just trying to be relevant again. In the end, he won't be able to top any of his earlier albums.

Eminem was allready rapping about politics in white america..i don't now what the fucking problem is here with people..oh wait, i got it the negative reactions of people here are from Trump supporters...fuck your president Trump..in Europe we hate him..and don't blame Eminem is rapping about your president because trump is a real bitch without brains and not only Eminem rapping about politics...tupac and others rappers were rapping about politics too
